parameters.name: AccessGroup
parameters.description:
The name of the permission group.

This parameter is required for a General-purpose NAS file system.

The default permission group for virtual private clouds (VPCs) is named DEFAULT_VPC_GROUP_NAME.

parameters.name: FileSystemId
parameters.description: The ID of the file system.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The number of results for each query.

Valid values: 10 to 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token used to retrieve the next page of results. Do not specify this parameter for the first request. For subsequent requests, set this value to the NextToken returned in the previous response.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags of the access point.
